bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Definitions of Terms, Letter Symbols, and Color Code for Hall Effect Devices
IEEE Standard Definitions of Terms, Letter Symbols, and Color Code for Hall Effect Devices

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Definitions of 48 terms are accompanied by a list of 38 letter symbols and the standard crossed-rectangle-in-circle-with-crosswires circuit symbol, with the colour code for lead wires to p-type and n-type Hall generators.<<ETX>>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
